group_1.textRight: T-This is incredible...

group_1.textLeft: Outsiders aren't allowed on school grounds,@you know.

group_1.textRight: I got proper permission to tour the place.
I thought I'd check to see how you're managing here.

group_1.textLeft: Is that so...

group_1.textRight: I'm relieved to see that you aren't slacking off.

group_1.textLeft: I didn't really want to do this lead organizer thing.

group_1.textRight: Really...?@Why are you helping, then?

group_1.textLeft: Because trying to escape instead of helping...
Brings much more trouble from the fool girl than@it's worth...

group_1.textRight: Karin has caused trouble to you...?

group_1.textLeft: Yes.
That, and...
She's not the only one who'd raise a fuss if I tried@to ditch here...

group_1.textRight: Looks like you are earnestly putting in effort now.
Thanks to all the Magical Girls here motivating you.

group_1.textLeft: ... You could put it that way.
(She has it wrong, but explaining would be too@much pain.)

group_1.textRight: Oh?@[chara:101201:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:101201:cheek_0][chara:101201:face_mtn_ex_010.exp3.json][chara:101201:lipSynch_1]Hi there!

group_1.textLeft: Oh my, if it isn't Karin...@Hello.
Did you finish buying everything?

group_1.textRight: Yup, all done now!
By the way, the Chairman spoke to me earlier.
They want you to give the opening speech for the@event, Alina-senpai.

group_1.textLeft: Say what? I refuse.

group_1.textRight: That won't do!@You're the lead organizer, so you must do it...!

group_1.textLeft: (... Ack, here we go again with her "Orders"...)
(No candy-based head trauma...?)
(What's happening?)
*Giggle*... Full of vigor, aren't you.

group_1.textRight: That's only par for the course when it comes to Halloween!
I even had my Magical Girl outfit adjusted to match@the occasion!

group_1.textLeft: Oh dear, I am most curious to see what it looks like.

group_1.textCenter: (the fool girl can't give orders without her transformation?)
(... That means I could escape right now.)

group_1.textRight: Of course, you can look all you want!
Ta-dah! Here it is!

group_1.textLeft: Oh my, those costumes must be...

group_1.textRight: Yes, exactly!@These are the characters from my manga:
The Pumpking and the Ghost Servant duo!

group_1.textLeft: Wow, I think they're simply lovely.

group_1.textRight: Get ready to hear the Pumpking's signature phrase!
*Ahem*...
Muahaha...
I am the kind-hearted Halloween guardian spirit,@the Pumpking!

group_1.textLeft: Wow! You've really nailed the Halloween vibe!

group_1.textRight: [chara:111201:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Ehehe.

group_1.textLeft: I hope you keep up your efforts and make this event@a successful one.

group_1.textRight: It's gonna be fine!
There's no way it'll fail when Alina-senpai is@working so hard on it!

group_1.narration: [flashEffect:flashWhite1][se:3201_heal]"[textRed:Alina-senpai!]@[textRed:Do your best working on the event]@[textRed:preparations in the adjusted costume!]"

group_1.textRight: Huh? Where's Alina-senpai?
Oh! There you are!@Is something wrong?

group_1.textLeft: ... No, it's nothing.
(Shit! I missed my chance to escape!)

group_1.textRight: I see... You were planning something after all,@weren't you...?
